title: National Weather Service confirms 12 tornadoes touched down Tuesday in Ohio | Flipboard
text: National Weather Service confirms 12 tornadoes touched down Tuesday in Ohio WILMINGTON, Ohio — There were at least 12 tornadoes during severe weather Tuesday in Ohio, with five touching down in one county, according to the … [cleveland.com | The Plain Dealer](/@clevelandnews) flipped this story into [Cleveland, Ohio Area News](/@clevelandnews/cleveland-ohio-area-news-93d7inhbz)•9h Related articles [Storms pummel northern Florida; woman killed in Tallahassee: Weather updates](/@usatoday/top-stories-u1i7u70sz/storms-pummel-northern-florida-woman-killed-in-tallahassee-weather-updates/a-_M1Y6PIWQOqqZFqP0qDf3Q%3Aa%3A3199709-af29282934%2Fusatoday.com) A wave of severe weather from a deadly storm system pummeled northern Florida on Friday, uprooting trees, damaging homes, causing widespread power outages and leaving at least one person dead.
